file_content.text: This is it. My fans bought the furniture. Let me show you something.
...You can see the Vankaysar Bridge burning from here. No one's saying what happened, but I haven't seen anything like it.
My father will kill me if he knows I'm recording this. Firebrand struck again. The spaceport this time.
I was so afraid, but I've never felt a rush like that before. Thank Valkorion the droids got me to safety....
Gray market holos. They used to trade them, like it was a game. Now watch this:
The Outlander's back. They say she's responsible for the meltdown. I still haven't heard from my brother....
The Outlander's back. They say he's responsible for the meltdown. I still haven't heard from my brother....
The Outlander's back. We were lucky she only caused a blackout, but what about next time?
The Outlander's back. We were lucky he only caused a blackout, but what about next time?
Zakuul should be safe. It's always been safe. What happens now?
Tone's a little different on that one, huh? Suddenly blowing up a building matters.
They're awed by Firebrand, but they fear the Outlander.
You come back to life after everything I--after five years. Not only that, you do it by blowing up a building and humiliating me.
The woman I remember could never be humiliated. But if she saw a chance to up her game, she'd do it in a second.
Humiliated? You?
The woman you remember isn't the woman in this room.
Are you sure?
I didn't mean to hurt you. Not by dying and not by coming back.
You know I'm sorry.
I didn't say hurt. I said humiliated.
Then what do you want from me?
Nothing you can do.
You were my friend. You know me. Do you really think I'd humiliate you?
You know I'm sorry.
I'm not assigning blame. Things are what they are.
Power junctions are set. Overwatch force fields cycle in an hour. Let's talk tactics until then.
I got lazy, figured there was no way through to these people. Set my sights low with bridges and spaceports.
But if you scared them, I can too. Guess I owe you for the wake-up call.
What happens next?
Is that why you brought me to your apartment? Searching for a way to repay me?
[Flirt] You owe me, huh?
Oh, I can figure something out. Just not this second.
We've got an hour until the power cycles. That's when we detonate the junctions and hit the Overwatch. Let's kill some time and talk plans.
I'm here because you're a useful tool, not because we're equals fighting Zakuul together.
You're not on my level.
Whatever. We'll get this job done, then you can decide if you still want an "alliance."
Now that the power junctions are rigged, can we strike at the Overwatch?
Pretty much. Force fields cycle in an hour, so we'll trigger the blackout then. Meantime, I've got maps and everything. Let's talk tactics....
...Everything goes down in the droid control center. You grab your data, I blow the machinery. And hopefully shoot the administrator.
You're sure the data's complete? The full city schematic?
Every droid in the city runs on those specs. You ever go to war with the Spire, that's your winning card.
It's time. Step one: Blow the junctions!
Like old times. Get ready to shoot droids, a few Knights... whatever Zakuul has to show.
That feels good. Come on--expect droids, maybe a few Knights... a grand old time.
Life is as empty without terror as without love.
I would permit this creature's existence from my throne. She cannot truly threaten perfection, but only enhance it.
But though chaos can be beautiful... it cannot last.
